Characteristics & Their Descriptions
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Hospital (Illnesses/Characteristics): Characteristics & Their Descriptions
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 21, 2002 - 09:21 am:

CharacteristicDescription
Big VoiceLoud voice attks more likely to succeed.
CharismaGives the knack of teaching others
CharmGets items cheaply with its charm.
DignityIncreases stats during battle.
EagleEyeSee high-speed opponents and up accuracy.
EliteA warrior that excels in all stats
ExpertGets good at a cert. training but moody if it fails.
FarSightCan see far very well but not near.
FailureGives poor execution in battle.
ForeseeAnticipate and dodge better but damage easily.
FullArmr Ups resis. to phys. attks but harder to move.
GlassHrtGreat training results but tires easily.
GluttonAlways hungry no matter how much it eats.
Hi AimEasier to increase acc. stat.
Hi IQEasier to increase int. stat.
Hi PowerEasier to increase pow. stat.
Hi SpeedEasier to increase spd. stat.
Hi StamnaEasier to increase def/life stat.
IronHart Training hard won't tire the monster out.
ListlessThe monster cannot get motivated. The monster has trouble training.
LuckStarThe LuckyStar brings good fortune.
Macho Increases Strength attacks but tires easily.
MagicGrdUps resis. to magic attks but lowers to physical.
NearSght Can see near very well but not far.
ObserverMakes it easier to find items on adventures.
PopularEasier to become popular. More Friends.
ReekFoot Feet moves hit less but can give psyc. damage.
Rock SkinReduces damage but harder to dodge attacks.
SatoriIncreases int but only in battle.
SlumpThe monster cannot get motivated. The monster gets stressed easily.
SoftBodySoftens damage from punch or stab attacks.
StatKingStrongest trait. Raises all stats
SuccessGives great execution in battle.
SunshineIncreases the number of clear weather days.
SureHeal healing moves are more likely to succeed.
Sweet SmellCharm attks are more likely to succeed.
Swt HipsMoves that use hips are more likely to succeed.
Swt VoiceMoves that use voice are more likely to succeed.
Tuf ArmorReduces damage but harder to dodge attacks.
Tuf ScaleReduces damage but harder to dodge attacks.
Tuf ShellReduces damage but harder to dodge attacks.
Tuf SkinReduces damage but harder to dodge attacks.
UndauntdDoesn't get sad no matter how much it loses.
Up BeamsIncreases the power of moves that use beams.
Up BreathIncreases power of moves that expel breath.
Up CharmIncreases power of moves that use charm.
Up ClawsIncreases power of moves that use the claws.
UpCountrIncreases power of counterattacks
Up DanceIncreases dance-move power abd dodging ability.
Up EarthUps Power, accuracy and toler. of Earth moves.
Up FangsIncreases power of moves that use fangs.
Up FeetIncreases power of moves that use the feet.
Up FireUps Power, accuracy and toler. of Fire moves.
Up Fire+Greatly ups power/acc/toler of Fire moves.
Up FistsIncreases power of moves that use the fists.
Up HandsIncreases power of moves that use the hands.
Up Hands+ Greatly ups power of moves that use hands.
Up HeadIncreases power of moves using head.
Up HornsIncreases power of moves that use horns.
Up IceUps power, accuracy and toler. of Ice moves.
Up IQIncreases power of int. moves.
Up LtningUps power, accuracy and toler. of Lightng moves.
UpLtning+Greatly ups power/acc/toler of Lightng moves.
Up MagicUps power,accuracy and toler. of Magic moves.
UpMagic+Greatly ups power/acc/toler of Magic moves.
Up MindUps power, accuracy and toler. of Mind moves.
Up Mind+Greatly ups power/acc/toler of Mind moves.
UpScytheIncreases the power of moves that use scythe
Up ShotIncreases acc. when throwing or shooting.
Up SwordIncreases power of moves that use sword.
Up TailIncreases power of moves that use tail.
Up WaterUps power, accuracy and toler. of Water moves.
Up Water+Greatly ups power/acc/toler of Water moves.
Up WindUps power, accuracy and toler. of Wind moves.
Worn Out Effectiveness of training drops.
